creator: trawick@apache.org
text:
Do you have /usr/lib/libsendfile.so and /usr/include/sys/sendfile.h?

Any chance you're using a gcc that was installed for an older level of the os,
and the copy of include files used by gcc doesn't match your system?

no response from submitter, apparently nobody else with this problem

submitter is free to reopen this PR in the future with requested information
creator: trawick@apache.org
